name: Claude-Mem
description: Persistent memory compression system for Claude Code. Automatically captures coding sessions and injects relevant context into future sessions.
detailed_description: Claude-Mem seamlessly preserves context across sessions by automatically capturing tool usage observations, generating semantic summaries, and making them available to future sessions. Features progressive disclosure, skill-based search, web viewer UI, and automatic operation.
key_features: Progressive disclosure with token cost visibility

name: Claudable
description: Open-source web builder leveraging local CLI agents (Claude Code, Cursor Agent) to build and deploy products effortlessly.
detailed_description: Claudable is an open-source alternative to Lovable that runs locally. Uses local CLI agents such as Claude Code and Cursor Agent to build and deploy products with an intuitive web interface.

name: Claw Code
description: Friendly macOS app for Claude Code. Uses Claude Code SDK to bring features to a native macOS app with Xcode workspace inspection.
detailed_description: A native macOS application that provides a friendly interface for Claude Code. Uses Claude Code SDK and includes accessibility API to inspect Xcode workspaces, making it ideal for iOS engineers.

name: Omnara
description: Command center for AI agents that syncs Claude Code sessions across terminal, web, and mobile with remote monitoring and team collaboration.
detailed_description: A comprehensive command center for AI agents allowing sync of Claude Code sessions across terminal, web, and mobile platforms. Features remote monitoring, human-in-the-loop interaction, and team collaboration. Recently open-sourced web and mobile applications.

name: Claude Code Templates
description: Collection of resources with polished UI, usage dashboard, analytics, and everything from slash commands to hooks to agents.
detailed_description: Comprehensive collection of Claude Code resources presented with a neatly polished UI. Features usage dashboard, analytics, and covers slash commands, hooks, agents, and more.
